text: 126 Madison Avenue (also known as 15 East 30th Street and Madison House) is a residential skyscraper under development by Fosun Property in NoMad, Manhattan, New York City. The building will rise 47 stories and , and is expected to be completed by 2021. J.D. Carisle Development Corp. is co- developing the project with Fosun Group, and Handel Architects is designing. The developers began construction in 2017. The building is actually located on Fifth Avenue, rather than on Madison Avenue as indicated by its name. ==History== J.D. Carlisle purchased the building's site for $102 million in March 2015 with plans to build a 53 story residential building. The developers received $350 million in construction financing from Bank OZK in May 2018. The structure topped out in June 2019. == References == Category:Proposed buildings and structures in New York City Category:Proposed skyscrapers in the United States Category:Condominiums and housing cooperatives in Manhattan Category:Residential buildings in Manhattan Category:Madison Avenue Category:Fifth Avenue Category:Midtown Manhattan Category:Residential condominiums in New York City
title: 126 Madison Avenue
